content: this is my own design after some proto-types this was the best flyer and safest for indoor flying this is a very easy pattern and should take less than 2 hours to personalize or just to make them holiday festive you can also add appliques to the center like hearts shamrocks flowers stars pumpkins etc enjoy materials sugar and cream cotton f hk 3 75mm large rounded needle to sew yarn gauge is not important size about 7 in diameter abbreviations chain = chain space s = space s single_crochet = single_crochet flo = front loop only blo = back loop only half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch uses us terminology doily frisbee round 1 chain 9 join to form ring chain 4 double_crochet chain 1 11xs in the ring join to 3rd chain of chain-4 with a slip_stitch 12dcs 12 chain-1 sps round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st space chain 3 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-3 sps round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st space chain 4 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-4 sps round 4 slip_stitch in first 2 chs of the loop to bring you to the center of that loop then… chain 1 single_crochet in center space chain 5 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-5 sps round 5 slip_stitch in next 2 chs chain 1 single_crochet in center space chain 6 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-6 sps round 6 slip_stitch in next 3 chs chain 1 single_crochet in center space chain 7 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-7 sps round 7 slip_stitch in next 3 chs chain 1 single_crochet in center space chain 8 single_crochet in next space around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 12 chain-8 sps round 8 chain 1 8 single_crochet in each space join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 96 single_crochet round 9 chain 2 half_double_crochet in flo of each st around join with a slip_stitch in top of beg chain 96 half_double_crochet note the back loop of round 9 will be used later to sew to free loop on round 11 rnds 10 - 12 chain 2 half_double_crochet in blo of 1st st and around join with a slip_stitch in 1st half_double_crochet fo after round 12 with 36 to sew 96 half_double_crochet note round 12 will not show on finished frisbee it is tucked inside if you wish you can omit round 12 and the frisbee will still fly but i think it is weighted a bit better if it is included finishing fold round 12 under and sew the first free loop of round 9 to the first free loop of 11 note i put the needle under the free loop on round 9 and up through the matching free loop on round 11 as
